Contemporary Era

Today, flat Earth theories continue to exist in various forms, often online and

through social media. Proponents of these theories argue that the Earth is flat

due to perceived flaws in scientific evidence, such as the existence of a

firmament above the atmosphere (Flat Earth Theory). However, these claims

have been thoroughly debunked by experts and evidence from various fields,

including astronomy, geology, and physics.
